mango_wlan_exp
  • Docs »
  • Framework
  • View page source

FrameworkÂ¶

The 802.11 Reference Design Experiments framework communicates with WARP nodes in order to control their behavior and gather status / log information.

Examples of wlan_exp experiments can be found at http://warpproject.org/trac/wiki/802.11/wlan_exp/examples
